member.name: T:RootOfNumber.Root
member.summary: Class for calculating n-th root of a real number

member.name: M:RootOfNumber.Root.NRoot(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Method for calculating n-th root of a real number with given precision
member.param: number from which the root is removed
member.returns: n-th root of the real number

member.name: M:RootOfNumber.Root.BinPower(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method for calculating n-th degree of a real number
member.returns: n-th degree of the number a
